name: Toilet Madness
description:
2D Momentum-based Platformer Where You Go Through Time As Vomit!!

  • Press space to throw up
  • Press A/D to move
  • Press S to stop time

Created as a Game-Jam game in 48 hours for the Bournemouth University 2019 Game-Jam

Credits

  • William Hughes (Roxra)
  • Philip Rudd
  • Andriy Shvets
  • David Stankevich
  • Tsz Wing Wong
